displayName: Ensure mostRecentCollection is not between 7 to 14 days
rationale: The MLSS data collection scripts have not gathered information about this database for an extended period of time.
recommended_action: Review the connection settings in the MLSS configuration for this database and ensure the database is available during the scheduled execution of the scripts.
error_message: Most recent collection is between 7 and 14 days
ruleNames: Ensure mostRecentCollection is not between 7 to 14 days
